languages.text: "Чего? Выключателями? Это же не машины, чтобы их выклю... О, проклятье, я поняла, как бы ты их "выключил". Пара грамм фузелина, вшитых в основание черепа, не так ли? Ты хоть понимаешь, что они — живые люди, а не ресурс?"

"They what? Switches? They're not machines, you can't switch them off— oh, groxshit, I get it now. A few grams of fyceline implanted at the base of the skull, is that your idea of a shutdown? You do realise those are living people, not a resource?"
languages.original_text: "Чего? Выключателями? Это же не машины, чтобы их выклю... О, проклятье, я поняла, как бы ты их "выключил". Пара грамм фузелина, вшитых в основание черепа, не так ли? Ты хоть понимаешь, что они — живые люди, а не ресурс?"

languages.text: "Wie bitte? Schalter? Das sind keine Maschinen, die kann man nicht abschalten ... Oh, Groxmist, jetzt verstehe ich. Ein paar Gramm Fycelin in die Schädelbasis implantiert, ist das Eure Idee von Abschalten? Ihr wisst aber schon, dass das lebende Menschen sind, keine Ressource?"
languages.original_text: "They what? Switches? They're not machines, you can't switch them off— oh, groxshit, I get it now. A few grams of fyceline implanted at the base of the skull, is that your idea of a shutdown? You do realise those are living people, not a resource?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie bitte? Schalter? Das sind keine Maschinen, die kann man nicht abschalten ... Oh, Groxmist, jetzt verstehe ich. Ein paar Gramm Fycelin in die Schädelbasis implantiert, ist das Eure Idee von Abschalten? Ihr wisst aber schon, dass das lebende Menschen sind, keine Ressource?"

languages.text: « Pardon ? Des désactivateurs ? Ce ne sont pas des machines, on ne peut pas les éteindre... Oh bon sang, je comprends. Quelques grammes de fyceline implantés à la base du crâne, c'est ça, votre solution ? Vous vous rendez bien compte qu'on parle d'êtres humains, pas de ressources ? »
languages.original_text: "They what? Switches? They're not machines, you can't switch them off— oh, groxshit, I get it now. A few grams of fyceline implanted at the base of the skull, is that your idea of a shutdown? You do realise those are living people, not a resource?"

traits.locale_text: « Pardon ? Des désactivateurs ? Ce ne sont pas des machines, on ne peut pas les éteindre... Oh bon sang, je comprends. Quelques grammes de fyceline implantés à la base du crâne, c'est ça, votre solution ? Vous vous rendez bien compte qu'on parle d'êtres humains, pas de ressources ? »

languages.text: “你说什么？关机？他们才不是机器，不是你说关就关——噢，真要命，我算是明白你的意思了。你指的是照着他们脑袋来上一枪，这就是你说的‘关机’吧？这些人是活人，不是资源，你应该是知道的吧？”
languages.original_text: "They what? Switches? They're not machines, you can't switch them off— oh, groxshit, I get it now. A few grams of fyceline implanted at the base of the skull, is that your idea of a shutdown? You do realise those are living people, not a resource?"

traits.locale_text: “你说什么？关机？他们才不是机器，不是你说关就关——噢，真要命，我算是明白你的意思了。你指的是照着他们脑袋来上一枪，这就是你说的‘关机’吧？这些人是活人，不是资源，你应该是知道的吧？”

languages.text: 「は？スイッチ？彼らは機械じゃないんだから、スイッチで切ることなんてできない…ああ、なるほどね。ファイセリン燃料を何グラムか頭蓋の底に埋め込むのね。それがあなたの言うシャットダウンの方法ってわけ？彼らは資源じゃなくて、生きた人間だよ。分かってる？」
languages.original_text: "They what? Switches? They're not machines, you can't switch them off— oh, groxshit, I get it now. A few grams of fyceline implanted at the base of the skull, is that your idea of a shutdown? You do realise those are living people, not a resource?"

traits.locale_text: 「何？スイッチ？彼らは機械じゃないのよ、スイッチでオフにしたりはできないーーくそっ、なるほどね。ファイセリン燃料を何グラムか頭に埋め込む、それがあなたのシャットダウンのアイデアってわけ？彼らは生きた人間で、資源じゃないって分かってる？」
「は？スイッチ？彼らは機械じゃないんだから、スイッチで切ることなんてできない…ああ、なるほどね。ファイセリン燃料を何グラムか頭蓋の底に埋め込むのね。それがあなたの言うシャットダウンの方法ってわけ？彼らは資源じゃなくて、生きた人間だよ。分かってる？」

languages.text: «Pero ¿qué mierda de grox dice? ¿Interruptores? No son máquinas, no se pueden apagar... Ah, ahora lo entiendo. Quiere apagarlos implantando unos cuantos gramos de fycelina en la base de sus cráneos, ¿no? Por favor, ¡que es gente viva, no un recurso!».
languages.original_text: "They what? Switches? They're not machines, you can't switch them off— oh, groxshit, I get it now. A few grams of fyceline implanted at the base of the skull, is that your idea of a shutdown? You do realise those are living people, not a resource?"

traits.locale_text: «Pero ¿qué mierda de grox dice? ¿Interruptores? No son máquinas, no se pueden apagar... Ah, ahora lo entiendo. Quiere apagarlos implantando unos cuantos gramos de fycelina en la base de sus cráneos, ¿no? Por favor, ¡que es gente viva, no un recurso!».

languages.text: "Ne işlemi, ne düğmesi? Makine değiller ki kapatasın!.. Hay groks yiyesice, şimdi anladım. Kapatma düğmesinden kastın, kafataslarına birkaç gram fiselin yerleştirmek mi? Bahsettiklerinin kaynak değil de insan evladı olduğunun farkındasın, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "They what? Switches? They're not machines, you can't switch them off— oh, groxshit, I get it now. A few grams of fyceline implanted at the base of the skull, is that your idea of a shutdown? You do realise those are living people, not a resource?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne işlemi, ne düğmesi? Makine değiller ki kapatasın!.. Hay groks yiyesice, şimdi anladım. Kapatma düğmesinden kastın, kafataslarına birkaç gram fiselin yerleştirmek mi? Bahsettiklerinin kaynak değil de insan evladı olduğunun farkındasın, değil mi?"
